entities: Committee established by paragraph 14 of resolution 1572 (2004)
Economic Community of Western African States (ECOWAS)
summary:
The Security Council,
Recalling previous resolutions on Côte d’Ivoire, particularly 1572 (2004), 1584 (2005), and 1609 (2005),
Welcoming efforts by the Secretary-General, African Union, and ECOWAS to re-establish peace and stability,
Recalling the interim report of the Group of Experts and anticipating its final report,
Determining the situation in Côte d’Ivoire remains a threat to international peace and security,
Acting under Chapter VII of the UN Charter,
1. Extends the Group of Experts' mandate to 15 December 2005 and requests necessary administrative measures;
2. Requests a brief written update from the Group of Experts by 1 December 2005 on the implementation of measures imposed by resolution 1572 (2004) and reaffirmed by resolution 1584 (2005), with recommendations;
3. Decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
